message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I believe we can find a price that works better for both of us. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose an offer of $14,000.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I'm looking to get closer to $18,000 for this product. It really is top quality and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and the value of the product. However, based on my assessment, I would like to propose an offer of $16,000 for the product.
